body:
Comment 3: 
Well, I believe, "On OS X the debuggers must be installed setgrp procmod." will not be
clear to anyone. I have done lots of programming using mac (iOS apps etc.) but have
never come across procmod. So, the sentence "must be installed setgrp procmod" is not
just difficult to understand but imho wrong grammatically.

I am not trying to offend you, but I believe this string should be reviewed by a native
English speaker. Thanks.
